price: A mos po kërkon ti shpërblim prej tyre, që të kenë frikë se mos po ngarkohen me detyrim?!
arabic: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: am tasaluhum ajran fahum min maghramin muth'qalūna
